document.text:
From: ' 
To: ' 
Subject: FW: Disclosures for Robert Adams 
Date: Thu, 12 Nov 2020 16:09:17 +0000 
Attachments: 
Adams_Disclosuressd.docx 
My 
edits attached. 
From: 
Sent: Thursday, November 12, 2020 10:52 AM 
To: 
Subject: Disclosures for Robert Adams 
Hey 
Chiefs: 
We 
have our discovery deadline tomorrow in the Adams case. Nick and I have gone through the 
witness interviews and propose making the attached disclosures, which we'll incorporate into the 
discovery cover letter. We'd be grateful if you could take a look. 
We've also checked in with the agents to get their views on these disclosures, and to make sure we are 
not missing anything. 
Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York 
New York NY 
10007 
Tel: 
EFTA00028654
